title: ISic001420. Funerary inscription of Krateas
body:
1Κρατέα εἰμὶ σ̣ᾶμα τ̣οῦ Εὐπ̣ύλ-
2ου   →

1ΚΡΑΤΕΑΕΙΜΙ.ΑΜΑ.ΟΥΕΥ.ΥΛ
2ΟΥ  →

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Arena 1998

English translation

I am the tombstone of Krateas, son of Eupylos

commentary

bibliography
